description: I am a graduate frontend student from the Scrimba platform, with a particular interest in constantly improving and discovering new things about coding. I enjoy difficult challenges, even if it takes me time to solve them, because I like finding and analyzing new approaches that are unknown to me for solve them. I like collectible card games, strategy games, rope jumping, and I am a fan of cannelloni (a typical Neapolitan dish). But most importantly, I really love listening to music.
scrimba: Click here if you want discover about Scrimba

resumes.High School Diploma in Computer Science: High School Diploma in Computer Science and Telecommunications
resumes.Frontend Developer Career Path certifica: Frontend Developer Career Path certificate of completion

project_site: Click here to see the project

project_description.vanlife_desc: A project based on the buying and selling of camper vans. React Routing method was used to navigate between pages and Authentication Required to access sections reserved only for logged-in users.
project_description.quizzical_desc: A simple quiz app project where you have to answer five general knowledge questions.
project_description.watchlist_desc: A Watchlist application project where you can create your own list of movies or TV shows to watch.
project_description.endgame_desc: This project is very similar to the game of Hangman. You have 8 lives. Each life is represented by a different programming technology. Try not to lose your favorite!
project_description.tenzies_desc: A project that represents a game where you have to win by finding the same number on all the dices. Will you be lucky quickly?
project_description.meme_desc: A simple project that generates random memes and allows you to write what you'd like to be shown on the image. Let your creativity flow!
project_description.travel_desc: A simple static project built with React depicting my travel journal with all the destinations I would like to visit.
